CustomField.description: Check this if resource should be treated as 'Global' Resources. 'Global' Resources can enter time for any Project, even if that Project normally requires Assignments for Time Entry.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this if resource should be treated as 'Global' Resources. 'Global' Resources can enter time for any Project, even if that Project normally requires Assignments for Time Entry.
CustomField.label: Allow Timecards Without Assignment
